# Special Characters & Entities

## HTML Entities

Ampersand: Tom & Jerry

Less than: 5 < 10

Greater than: 10 > 5

Quote marks: "double" and 'single'

## Unicode Characters

Emoji: ğŸ‰ ğŸš€ âœ… âŒ ğŸ’¡

Accents: cafÃ©, naÃ¯ve, rÃ©sumÃ©, piÃ±ata

Currency: $100, â‚¬50, Â£30, Â¥1000

Math: Ï€ â‰ˆ 3.14, âˆš2 â‰ˆ 1.41, âˆ

Arrows: â†’ â† â†‘ â†“ â†”

## Escape Characters

Asterisks: \*not italic\*

Underscores: \_not italic\_

Backslash: \\

Backticks: \`not code\`

## Mixed In Sentences

The price is $50 & includes shipping â†’ total < â‚¬60.

## In Lists

- Item with emoji ğŸ¯
- Item with accent: cafÃ©
- Item with math: xÂ² + yÂ² = zÂ²
